infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to scan gourds and predict harvest readiness.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to select gourd images for analysis.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to scan gourds.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone for video recording (optional).

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to select gourd images.
